"Hey there! I'm not sure if you've noticed, but your knife is looking a little dull. Perhaps it's time to sharpen it up?"
"Just a friendly reminder that you should always use caution when handling a knife, as they can be quite sharp and dangerous if not used properly."
"It's important to keep your knife clean and dry, as moisture can cause rusting and damage to the blade."
"Have you considered using a knife block to store your knife safely and securely? It's a great way to keep it organized and prevent accidental injuries."
"If you're planning on using your knife for cooking, be sure to use a sharpener to get the best results. A dull knife can make even the simplest tasks difficult and time-consuming."
